details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-2:202x - 8.2 Logical structure - 8.2.4 Structure types - Same namespace mapping
details.description: Structure types shall not be role mapped to other structure types in the same namespace

rule.description: Structure types shall not be role mapped to other structure types in the same namespace

error.message: Structure type %1 is role mapped to other structure type in the same namespace
